Description:
Detects calls to base64 encoded WMI class such as "Win32_ShadowCopy", "Win32_ScheduledJob", etc.

Author: Christian Burkard (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PowerShell Base64 Encoded WMI Classes
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((process_path like '%\powershell.exe' or process_path like '%\pwsh.exe') and (original_file_name = 'powershell.exe' or original_file_name = 'pwsh.dll')) and ((command like '%vwbpag4amwayaf8auwboageazabvahcaywbvahaaeq%' or command like '%caaqbuadmamgbfafmaaabhagqabwb3agmabwbwahka%' or command like '%xagkabgazadiaxwbtaggayqbkag8adwbjag8acab5a%' or command like '%v2lumzjfu2hhzg93y29we%' or command like '%dpbjmyx1noywrvd2nvch%' or command like '%xaw4zml9tagfkb3djb3b5%') or (command like '%vwbpag4amwayaf8auwbjaggazqbkahuabablagqasgbvagia%' or command like '%caaqbuadmamgbfafmaywboaguazab1agwazqbkaeoabwbia%' or command like '%xagkabgazadiaxwbtagmaaablagqadqbsaguazabkag8ayg%' or command like '%v2lumzjfu2nozwr1bgvksm9i%' or command like '%dpbjmyx1njagvkdwxlzepvy%' or command like '%xaw4zml9ty2hlzhvszwrkb2%') or (command like '%vwbpag4amwayaf8auabyag8aywblahmacw%' or command like '%caaqbuadmamgbfafaacgbvagmazqbzahma%' or command like '%xagkabgazadiaxwbqahiabwbjaguacwbza%' or command like '%v2lumzjfuhjvy2vzc%' or command like '%dpbjmyx1byb2nlc3%' or command like '%xaw4zml9qcm9jzxnz%') or (command like '%vwbpag4amwayaf8avqbzaguacgbbagmaywbvahuabgb0a%' or command like '%caaqbuadmamgbfafuacwblahiaqqbjagmabwb1ag4ada%' or command like '%xagkabgazadiaxwbvahmazqbyaeeaywbjag8adqbuahqa%' or command like '%v2lumzjfvxnlckfjy291bn%' or command like '%dpbjmyx1vzzxjby2nvdw50%' or command like '%xaw4zml9vc2vyqwnjb3vud%') or (command like '%vwbpag4amwayaf8atabvagcazwblagqatwbuafuacwblahia%' or command like '%caaqbuadmamgbfaewabwbnagcazqbkae8abgbvahmazqbya%' or command like '%xagkabgazadiaxwbmag8azwbnaguazabpag4avqbzaguacg%' or command like '%v2lumzjftg9nz2vkt25vc2vy%' or command like '%dpbjmyx0xvz2dlze9uvxnlc%' or command like '%xaw4zml9mb2dnzwrpblvzzx%')))
